name: VisionPrescription
title: VisionPrescription
description: An authorization for the provision of glasses and/or contact lenses to a patient.

elements.name: VisionPrescription
elements.description: An authorization for the provision of glasses and/or contact lenses to a patient.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: A unique identifier assigned to this vision prescription.

elements.name: status
elements.description: The status of the resource instance.

elements.name: created
elements.description: The date this resource was created.

elements.name: patient
elements.description: A resource reference to the person to whom the vision prescription applies.

elements.name: encounter
elements.description: A reference to a resource that identifies the particular occurrence of contact between patient and health care provider during which the prescription was issued.

elements.name: dateWritten
elements.description: The date (and perhaps time) when the prescription was written.

elements.name: prescriber
elements.description: The healthcare professional responsible for authorizing the prescription.

elements.name: lensSpecification
elements.description: Contain the details of the individual lens specifications and serves as the authorization for the fulfilment by certified professionals.
